description:
The I AM LOST (Location) line is for parents who wish to report their children missing. Child Find brings missing children home through the use of in-house professional staff, national dissemination of photos of missing children to companies and corporations, the toll-free number, counseling for searching parents and nationwide networking efforts with law enforcement, state clearinghouse personnel, social service agencies and missing children agencies.

###MON###
###COL###
name: CHILD FIND OF AMERICA, INC.
